# `useAuthLoading()`

:::caution Deprecated
When using both {@link useAuthLoading} and {@link useAuthenticated} together, their initial state will change
three times:

`(true, false)` -> `(false, false)` -> `(false, true)`

Use {@link useAuthenticationStatus} instead.
:::
